data.meaning_mnemonic: When <radical>rain</radical> falls on <radical>Wolverine</radical>, it turns to <kanji>snow</kanji>. He's so emotionally distant and cold that the rain freezes into snow as soon as it gets near him.
data.meaning_hint: Imagine Wolverine in the pouring rain, creating a little halo of snow around him wherever he goes. It's strangely beautiful. That is one cold, traumatized dude…
data.reading_mnemonic: You're concerned for Wolverine's mental health. Him being so emotionally cold that he turns rain to <kanji>snow</kanji> means <reading>you kee</reading>p (ゆき) asking if he's okay. But that only makes him want to be more distant.
data.reading_hint: Sheesh, emotionally distant people are complicated. The more you keep trying to help them, the more they reject you. Wolverine could do with a nice holiday to melt all that snow away.
